snippet: Rwanda’s defense minister is commanding a rebellion in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo that is being armed by Rwanda and Uganda, according to a United Nations report.
abstract: United Nations says Rwanda’s defense minister is commanding a rebellion in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo that is being armed by Rwanda and Uganda, who sent troops to aid the insurgents in a deadly attack on United Nations peacekeepers; Uganda and Rwanda deny accusations.
lead_paragraph: Rwanda’s defense minister is commanding a rebellion in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo that is being armed by Rwanda and Uganda, according to a United Nations report.

headline.main: Congo: Rwanda and Uganda Arm Congo Rebels, U.N. Report Says
headline.print_headline:
Congo: Rwanda and Uganda Arm
Congo Rebels, U.N. Report Says
